author: mrodozov
body:
Fix headers related to #15248. 
This header HepMCTemplate.h had only one include and one template definition, and was included only by 
Herwig7Interface.h . ThePEG/Vectors/HepMCTraits.h itself did not included some types (like map) used by HepMCTemplate and since ThePEG is an external, instead of changing the external headers or requesting changes (or applying a patch) I just moved the entire header content into Herwig7Interface as shortcut. Let me know if that is NOT ok.
title: fix hdr GeneratorInterface/Herwig7Interface
